modal_connect_description: Pick from the following web wallets
modal_wrong_chain_description: Please connect your wallet to the {{chainName}} network.
approve_twitter_auth_description: Connect your twitter account. You must follow @{{name}} on twitter to be approved for the presale.
approve_web3_connect_description: Connect your web3 wallet to begin the approval process
approve_web3_login_description: Complete a web3 login. You will need to sign a message to complete this stop. This costs no gas and is only used to verify that you control the connected address
approve_twitter_follow_description: Follow @{{name}} on twitter to be approved for the presale.
approve_success_description: You have been approved for the presale. Let's seal the deal!
